price: Dhugumatti, inni warra amananii Gooftaa isaanii irratti hirkatan irratti aangoon isaaf hin jiru.
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ لَيۡسَ لَهُۥ سُلۡطَٰنٌ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ يَتَوَكَّلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: innahu laysa lahu sul'ṭānun ʿalā alladhīna āmanū waʿalā rabbihim yatawakkalūna
